entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
